definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
Marshal Zhao, aka Zhao Gongming or Zhao Xuantan, God of Wealth in the Chinese folk tradition and Taoism

sentences.english: Around the 4th century AD, the site of the Oita city was once called "Bungo".
sentences.chinese: 大約在公元4世紀，大分市所在地域便被稱爲豐後國。

sentences.english: In 840, large numbers of Uighurs (an ancient name for modern Uygurs) entered Xinjiang.
sentences.chinese: 公元840年，大批迴鶻人進入新疆。

sentences.english: This comes from a plague that was spreading in 590 A.
sentences.chinese: 這源於公元590年意大利的一場瘟疫。

sentences.english: In the spring of 480 Xerxes set out from Sardis.
sentences.chinese: 在公元前480年春，薜西斯從薩迪斯出發。

sentences.english: The first wxdye were the Gaels -came about 600 BC.
sentences.chinese: 第一次高潮是約公元前600年蓋爾人的來臨。

sentences.english: In 771 B. C, the capital was moved eastward to Luoyang in present-day Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 公元前771年，周的首都東遷到了現河南省的洛陽。

sentences.english: In 638 the Moslems had captured Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 公元638年穆斯林人佔領了耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: Hannibal defeated the Romans in 216 BC.
sentences.chinese: 漢尼拔於公元前216年打敗了羅馬軍。

sentences.english: By the first century BC the Chinese had developed the technology for deep drilling boreholes.
sentences.chinese: 公元前一世紀，中國人已經發明瞭深井鑽探技術。

sentences.english: Was it in 132 AD, when the Chinese scientist Zhang Hêng invented the seismocope?
sentences.chinese: 是公元132年中國科學家張衡發明地動儀的時候嗎？

sentences.english: George I died in A. D. 1727.
As early as 6000 B. C. Dushan Jade has been mined.
sentences.chinese: 早在公元前6000年獨山玉就已經被開採。

sentences.english: The first evidence that ancient people had moved to Mesa Verde is from about the year five hundred.
sentences.chinese: 古人移居到梅沙而第的第一個證據來自公元五百年。

sentences.english: Most historians peg the first celebration of Christmas to Rome in 336 AD.
sentences.chinese: 大部分歷史學家掛聖誕慶祝羅馬首次在公元336。

sentences.english: Bone whistles, used as a type of flute, have been found dating back to 5,000 BC.
sentences.chinese: 用作笛子的骨哨早已出現在公元前5，000年。

sentences.english: In fact, the paintings have been dated back to around 13,000 BC.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，這些油畫大約要追溯到公元前一萬三千年。

definition: lit. progenitor of the Yuan Dynasty (1279-1368), title of Khubilai Khan (1215-1294), first Yuan dynasty emperor, reigned 1260-1294
first year of an emperor's reign/first year of an era/first year of a significant time period
Later Han or Eastern Han dynasty (25-220)/Later Han of the Five Dynasties (947-950)
Hongwu Emperor, also written Hung-wu Ti, reign name of first Ming emperor Zhu Yuanzhang 朱元璋[Zhu1 Yuan2 zhang1] (1328-1398), reigned 1386-1398, Temple name 明太祖[Ming2 Tai4 zu3]
to change an emperor's or ruler's reign title (old)
